item.title: Nvidia says two mystery customers accounted for 39% of Q2 revenue
item.description: Nearly 40% of Nvidia’s second quarter revenue came from just two companies, identified in a filing as "Customer A" and "Customer B."

item.title: Taco Bell is having second thoughts about relying on AI at the drive-through
item.description: Taco Bell has apparently rolled out voice AI-powered ordering at more than 500 drive-throughs, leading to unflattering viral moments like someone orde...

item.title: The fall of EV startup Fisker: A comprehensive timeline
item.description: Here is a timeline of the events that led fledgling automaker Fisker to file for bankruptcy.

item.title: I’m really impressed with this $400 portable projector
item.description: Projectors have come a long way and this portable one from Lumi offers impressive features, like Google TV and an obstacle avoidance function.

item.title: Cracks are forming in Meta’s partnership with Scale AI
item.description: Two months after making a $14.3B investment in Scale AI, Meta is relying heavily on its competitors to train next generation AI models.
